page.title: 10Village Events
page.content: {Bowes Carnival}Every year there is a Carnival.The Queen is chosen by the schoolchildren and there is a parade through the village then a ceremony of crowning at the village hall.Fancy dress is worn and this year there was a bogie(go-kart) Grand Prix.During the carnival there are competitions for football,quoits,tug-of-war,children's sports and a cross-country run for boys and girls. {Bowes Show }This year is the 100th Swaledale Royal Show.This annual event is one of the main sheep shows in a region dominated by sheep farming. There are also classes for other animals,vegetables,cakes and bread,decorated and carved shepherds' crooks and schoolchildren's work.
